Texts.Chs: 找到洞穴并调查^cyan;能量源^reset;
Texts.Eng: Find the cavern and investigate the ^cyan;Energy Source^reset;

Texts.Chs: 也许这个友好的生物可以帮助我^green;修理飞船^reset;并逃离这个星系。无论何时无论何地无论什么方法我都需要使用我的^orange;个人三度仪^reset;进行研究。
Texts.Eng: Perhaps this friendly creature can help me ^green;repair the ship^reset; and get away from this star system. I'll need to work at it either way, using my ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; to conduct research whenever I can.

Texts.Chs: 研究^orange;工程^reset;并制造^orange;加工台^reset;。
感谢^green;维纳利斯^reset;，你已成功踏出了逃脱这个星球的第一步。他暗示你应该探索附近的黑暗洞穴，并检查是否有可能对你的维修至关重要的能源。
Texts.Eng: Thanks to ^green;Vinalisj^reset;, you've managed your first steps towards escaping this planet. He's hinted that you should explore a nearby ^orange;Dark Cavern^reset; and check it for ^green;Energy Sources^reset; that may prove vital in your repairs.

Texts.Chs: 使用^orange;加工台^reset;制造^orange;电磁铁^reset;
Texts.Eng: Use a ^orange;Machining Table^reset; to create an ^orange;Electromagnet^reset;
